about_the_game:
This is an action puzzle game. Carry the rod to the finish line without touching the metal frames. If you touch, it will explode. There are four courses, "EASY", "NORMAL", "HARD", and "IMPOSSIBLE", depending on the difficulty level. The time to reach the finish line is recorded, and if you register, you can compete with users all over the world. I am waiting for your challenge!

【Game Instructions】
Object:
Go through a course to the finish line with a rod.

Course:
Made up with metal frames in which an electric current flows.

Game Play:
Control the rod not to touch metal frames.

Note:
If you push or pull the rod in order to skip the middle of courses, the game is over.

Dodge the dangerous traps and complete this game!!

name: DANGER: ELECTRIC SHOCK

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A simple action puzzle game. Carry the rod to the finish line while avoiding the dangerous traps!!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
